!Version ArubaOS-CX PL.10.11.0001
!export-password: default
hostname "ARUBA-CX-SW01"
!
user admin group administrators password ciphertext xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
!
ssh server vrf default
ssh server vrf mgmt
!
vlan 1
    name DEFAULT_VLAN
!
vlan 100
    name Users
!
vlan 200
    name Servers
!
vlan 999
    name Native_VLAN
!
interface mgmt
    no shutdown
    ip static 10.0.0.10/24
    default-gateway 10.0.0.1
!
interface 1/1/1
    description Uplink:CORE-SW01:Gi1/0/1
    no shutdown
    vlan trunk native 999
    vlan trunk allowed 100,200
    spanning-tree bpdu-guard
!
interface 1/1/2
    description Endpoint:Floor1-Office-PC01
    no shutdown
    vlan access 100
    spanning-tree port-type admin-edge
    spanning-tree bpdu-guard
!
interface 1/1/3
    description Server:ESXi-Host01
    no shutdown
    vlan access 200
!
interface 1/1/4
    no shutdown
    vlan access 1
!
interface lag 1
    description LAG:CORE-SWITCH-PAIR
    no shutdown
    vlan trunk native 999
    vlan trunk allowed 100,200
    lacp mode active
!
interface 1/1/48
    lag 1
!
interface 1/1/47
    lag 1
!
interface vlan 100
    description "User VLAN Gateway"
    ip address 10.10.100.1/24
!
interface vlan 200
    description "Server VLAN Gateway"
    ip address 10.10.200.1/24
!
interface loopback 0
    ip address 10.255.255.1/32
!
spanning-tree mode mstp
spanning-tree
!
ntp server 10.0.0.1 prefer
ntp enable
!
logging 10.0.0.100
!
snmp-server community public
!
router ospf 1
    router-id 10.255.255.1
    area 0.0.0.0
!
